arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Norwich City as three 8/10s handed out after crucial win - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley held on for a crucial three points against Norwich City to move back into top spot.

arts.ttl: Burnley go top of Championship after Mejbri and Anthony see off Norwich
arts.sum: Burnley went back to the top of the Championship after holding on to beat Norwich at Turf Moor and extend their unbeaten league run to 29 matches. Goals from Hannibal Mejbri and Jaidon Anthony before the break were reward for a dominant first-half display by the hosts, who moved three points clear of Leeds. Norwich were much improved in the second half and Jack Stacey pulled one back, but Scott Parker’s side stood firm to also extend their unbeaten home league run this season to 21 matches. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: 'Huge': Scott Parker's verdict on Burnley's win against Norwich City that sees them return top
arts.sum: Scott Parker was delighted with the intensity levels his Burnley side showed during their “huge” win against Norwich City to move back top.

arts.ttl: 'Clearly not working' - Norwich fans react to Burnley loss
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 2-1 Championship loss to Burnley at Turf Moor.

arts.ttl: Emmanuel Adeboyega would be open to a Dundee United return if he can't get into the Norwich City team
arts.sum: The young defender has had a successful loan that has seen him play a major part for United and also pushed him into the Ireland under-21 squad.

arts.ttl: Burnley edge out Norwich to return to top of Championship
arts.sum: Hannibal Mejbri and Jaidon Anthony were on target for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Burnley 2-1 Norwich City: Clarets take advantage of early kick-off to move above Leeds United into top spot
arts.sum: Burnley survived a nervous finish to reclaim top spot in the fight for automatic promotion with a crucial victory over Norwich City.

arts.ttl: 'Burnley thriving on the pressure!' | Anthony doubles Clarets' advantage
arts.sum: Burnley are in dreamland as Jaidon Anthony's deflected shot gives them a two-goal advantage against Norwich.

arts.ttl: 25 images of Burnley fans arriving at Turf Moor for Championship fixture against Norwich City
arts.sum: Following the 0-0 draw with Derby County on Tuesday night, Burnley fans will be hoping that the Clarets can return to winning ways against the Canaries at Turf Moor.
